long_desc.thetext:
Andreas Tepper schrieb: > Hi Fabian, > > i am using version 0.7.2 SDK, "maked" under cygwin version 2.573.2.2 on Windows Server 2003 R2 Standard Edition with SP2. > > You may also want to look at the whole message-block stated by firebug while loading my application: > > **************** > 009050 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: qooxdoo 0.7.2FireBug.js (line 75) > 009066 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: loaded 0 old classesFireBug.js (line 75) > 009066 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: loaded 327 classesFireBug.js (line 75) > 009066 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: loaded 8 interfacesFireBug.js (line 75) > 009082 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: loaded 9 mixinsFireBug.js (line 75) > 009082 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: loaded 26 themesFireBug.js (line 75) > 009082 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: loaded 8 localesFireBug.js (line 75) > 009082 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: client: gecko-1.8/win/deFireBug.js (line 75) > 009097 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: browser: firefox/svgFireBug.js (line 75) > 009097 DEBUG: qx.core.Init[4]: application: af.CostsReport[16]FireBug.js (line 75) > GET http://devserver/projectdetail/costs_report/source/costs_report_backend.php?nocache=1197371886878&p_id=801&action=GetCostsList (140ms)XmlHttpTransport.... (line 306) > 009504 WARN: qx.ui.table.pane.Scroller[105]: Objects of class 'qx.ui.table.pane.Scroller' does not support the event 'cellDblclick': Error - at qx.core.Target:96 at qx.ui.table.Table:1853 at af.CostsReport:229 at qx.core.Init:235 at qx.lang.Function:181 FireBug.js (line 89) > 009519 INFO: qx.core.Init[4]: main runtime: 422msFireBug.js (line 82) > 009676 DEBUG: af.CostsReport[16]: preloading visible images...FireBug.js (line 75) > 009988 INFO: af.CostsReport[16]: render runtime: 281msFireBug.js (line 82) > 010223 DEBUG: af.CostsReport[16]: preloading hidden images...FireBug.js (line 75) > evento cellDblclick > **************** > > As i mentioned before, the application runs fine, no further errors or warnings, even the cellDblclick is fired and processed correctly... > > Regards, > After looking at the code I'm not 100% sure why You get this warning. The good news is that this is only a warning message and not a real error. Could you add it to Bugzilla?
Best Fabian
could not reproduce this bug with the current legacy branch
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
